entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Harbour 1:00 PM PST Saturday 07 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 7.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 6.6°C
Wind: NE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: A few showers. Temperature steady near 8.

entry.title: Saturday night: A few showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near Haro Strait in the afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 07 January 2023
